title: arahara murugA
sahitya:
arahara murugA ArumukhAvena nI karudinAl manamE gati peralAmE


anupallavi

  maruda malaiyOnai mAdhavan marugOnai uru tuNaiyAga nI urudiyAi nambi


caraNam    naraka vEdanai tandu nALtoru mundanai nondu ayaravATTum bandha vinaiyai OTTa
parama pAvanamAna bhakti prEmaiyODu urugum uLLamadil perugum paravashattODu
